 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקַע‎</span>] **verb** ==be [severed, figurative] alienated, estranged== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***split, rend, sacrifice*** [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Semitic i. 471 f.; 2d ed. 491</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***split up, open*** (intransitive) [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>647</sup>; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶקַע‎</span> cleft, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽקְעָה נַפְשִׁי מֵעַל‎</span> [[Ezek.23.18|Ezek 23:18]] ***my soul was estranged from*** her sister (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָקַע‎</span>), compare v[[Ezek.23.22|Ezek 23:22]] v[[Ezek.23.28|Ezek 23:28]] (both with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>).
